DataElement.preferredName: Caries Periodontal Probe Assessment Total Volume Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the calculated volume of decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous by a calibrated dental instrument used to measure periodontal pocket depth and/or clinical attachment level at various locations around the teeth.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the evaluation of decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous by a calibrated dental instrument used to measure periodontal pocket depth and/or clinical attachment level at various locations around the teeth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.

Concepts.definition: The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.

Property.preferredDefinition:
A calibrated dental instrument used to measure periodontal pocket depth and/or clinical attachment level
at various locations around the teeth. May also be used for other measurements in the mouth.:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: A calibrated dental instrument used to measure periodontal pocket depth and/or clinical attachment level at various locations around the teeth. May also be used for other measurements in the mouth.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete.:Volume; the amount of 3-dimensional space occupied by an object.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
The amount of three dimensional space occupied by an object or the capacity of a space or container.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 11-20-07:  This VD is not being used by any DEs.  The long name was originally "Total Volume Value" and the rep term "Value".  I added "Total Volume" to the rep term.  Data type was originally java.lang.integer.  The short name was originally 2633789v1.0.  Added a VD origin. Add decimal place.

DataElement.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form
